RandomCombinator<T> - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.combinators
The class RandomCombinator implements a combinator of results that randomly selects a result each time it is called.

ReplicableInboundPortNonBlocking<T> - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.ports
The class ReplicableInboundPortNonBlocking implements an inbound port for the ReplicableCI component interface, making the the call method of the component executed by the thread of the caller component.

ReplicationManager<T> - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.components
The class ReplicationManager implements a generic component to represent several replication patterns in a distributed application: dispatchers, fault-tolerant or error-tolerant, etc. replication.

ReplicationManagerNonBlocking<T> - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.components
The class ReplicationManagerNonBlocking introduces the possibility to call many replicas but returning the first result while letting the other (repeated) computations terminating (not possible with invokeAny, an important behaviour when using replication for fault-tolerance.
ReplicationManagerNonBlocking(int, String, SelectorI, ReplicationManagerNonBlocking.CallMode, CombinatorI<T>, PortFactoryI, String[]) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.components.ReplicationManagerNonBlocking
creating an asynchronous replication manager.
ReplicationManagerNonBlocking(String, int, String, SelectorI, ReplicationManagerNonBlocking.CallMode, CombinatorI<T>, PortFactoryI, String[]) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.components.ReplicationManagerNonBlocking
creating an asynchronous replication manager.
ReplicationManagerNonBlocking.CallMode - Enum in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.components
The enumeration CallMode defines the different call semantics for the replicas by the replication manager.
rg - Variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.combinators.RandomCombinator
the random number generator used in this example; the Java one is known not to be very good, but this is just an example.
rg - Variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.examples.components.MonitoredServer
